title: Hermitcraft 8 Episode 12: Building My Boatem GIGA Base!
author: GoodTimesWithScar
description:
Video Sponsor* Go to http://expressvpn.com/goodtimeswithscar and find out how to get 3 free months of ExpressVPN free!

Hermitcraft season 8 episode 12! We start out Ep 12 of Hermitcraft S8 by selling Grian a charged creepers for his magic creatures shop and we start our Mega base! The Giga base will be on top of Grian and Pearls base. My Boatem Giga base is a massive mountain with clouds and a city when it's completed! I hope you enjoyed the video and the new Minecraft base! See you in the next Hermitcraft episode!

Hermitcraft Season 8 playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSCZsQa9VSCdDJmIMkIuK0XazfnI677oV

---------------------------------------------------------
Hermitcraft SMP - season 8 info:

We have 2 new Hermitcraft members for the new season: 
*GeminiTay: https://www.youtube.com/user/GeminiTard
*PearlescentMoon: https://www.youtube.com/c/PearlescentMoon

We are all playing and building on one big Hermit island together with Minecraft proximity voice chat mod. 

Seed: -7381235180058670651

For more information and links to all things Hermitcraft, follow the link to the Hermitcraft website: https://hermitcraft.com/
